name: com.readyplayerme.webview
description:
Ready Player Me WebView helps you display an in-engine browser that helps you load RPM website where you can create avatars and receive avatar URL at the end of the process.
WebView is mobile only and works in Android and IOS builds.

samples.description: Contains a sample scene for RPM WebView usage. You can build this scene for Android and IOS to make an avatar using RPM website and receive the avatar URL at the end.
